actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to authorize the enlistment of the citizens of the Northern Mariana Islands in the Armed Forces of the United States of America.
subjects: Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands

summary.text: Authorizes the enlistment of citizens of the Northern Mariana Islands into the Armed Forces of the United States if such an individual indicates in writing an intent to become a citizen, and not a national of the United States upon the full implementation of the Covenant to Establish a Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands in Political Union with the United States of America.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the enlistment of the citizens of the Northern Mariana Islands in the Armed Forces of the United States of America.
